sentence: move the rightmost blue block to the left side of the blocks that you moved before
move the rightmost blue block to the left side of right rear yellow and purple blocks
straighten and move the blue block behind the purple block between the rearmost blue block and the initially moved yellow block
straighten and move the blue block behind the purple block so that it is between the blue and yellow blocks on the rear right
pick up the blue block in front of the moved blocks and place it to the left side of the moved blocks
